website_summaries.verdict: If you want the best and price is no object, this is a worthwhile investment.
pros: Powerful motor tackles hard flooring and carpet capably
HEPA filter traps dust particles effectively
Easy-empty canister expels dirt at the touch of a button

customer_reviews.title: It is a 5-star vacuum at the beginning. One ...
customer_reviews.text: It is a 5-star vacuum at the beginning. One year later? It runs for 48 seconds after being fully charged overnight. I contacted Dyson about how to get a new battery and did not receive a reply.
customer_reviews.author: macman

customer_reviews.title: Battery life is a JOKE! 7 minutes on max!
customer_reviews.text: 7 minute battery life, 3 1/2 hours to charge! If you run this on max, the battery only lasts 7 minutes and I got this info straight from a Dyson rep. I told him that that’s a joke! I told him basically the machine is only good for a very light cleaning and that’s ridiculous for the price. I told him I would be returning it and he said thank you for your time. Got it yesterday, boxing it up today.
customer_reviews.author: T. Weidner

customer_reviews.title: Best vacuum I have owned, only one downside
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best vacuum I have owned. It is lightweight, easy to empty, and actually picks everything up off of our hardwood floor thanks to the floor attachment. We have a small child and use it after every meal around the table, and the cordless feature is far more convenient than we imagined. The battery also lasts plenty long enough on one charge. The only downside is having to hold the power trigger down the whole time you are vacuuming. If you have to vacuum a large area, it eventually rubs your thumb raw.
customer_reviews.author: Holley D

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use. POOR battery life. Not sure it's worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum has a lot of good features most especially that it's easy to use. The battery life is terrible. If you want to vacuum baseboards, crown molding, and the floors, it will take all day because you have to stop and recharge multiple times. The charging time is long. My house is only 2000 square feet. For the price, I think Dyson should provide two batteries for every unit if they can't fix the battery life problem.
customer_reviews.author: Mary McLeod

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I should purchase V10 install this one. V10 get more powerful with same price.
customer_reviews.author: jmn27

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Product Design
customer_reviews.text: As other reviewers have mentioned--since you're required to hold the trigger constantly while vacuuming, your hand is forced into an awkward position that rubs it against a hard plastic corner. The canister opens awkwardly, which means dust all over the place and another vacuuming session required. And the one I received might be a lemon, but it only vacuums for about 10 minutes on a full charge. It's going back as soon as I can send it. Ridiculously over-priced for poor design and overall poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: LT

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum, mediocre handle/grip
customer_reviews.text: In spite of the hefty price tag, this does pick up a lot of dirt and it's so easy to change the attachments. Most of my floors are regular carpet or hard flooring. With my shag carpet, I have to pull it toward me - can't push it away - but it's the same with my old plug-in vacuum. CON: There is NO comfort protection on the grip (i.e., silicone padding, finger grooves, etc..), so for those with softer hands, it will rub the webbing between your thumb and index finger if used for longer periods.
customer_reviews.author: Amz Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pure Garbage!!
customer_reviews.text: When you spend 600 bucks on something, it should not have charging issues after 14 months. Pure Garbage!!!!!’ Rip-off!
customer_reviews.author: Ron Gardner

customer_reviews.title: This is the perfect vacuum for an older person - lightweight
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect vacuum for an older person - lightweight, easy to "dump the residue" and the charge can outlast my energy reserve. About the time I run out of charge, I have vacuumed a couple of rooms and I need a rest. The young folks in my home love this vacuum, too. Great suction. Fantastic for detailing a car. I will never buy another brand/style of vacuum. I have mostly tile and wood floors - very little carpet - but, it seems to work well on carpet. I no longer get tired just getting the vacuum out to start vacuuming!!! HUGE IMPROVEMENT in my home.
customer_reviews.author: S Ritter

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality control
customer_reviews.text: Dyson needs to improve on their quality control. The vacuum would not accept a charge for longer than two minutes without shutting down. The charging lights showed it was two thirds charged when first plugged in, but then shut down after two minutes of charging. My first thought was it didn't need charging so I tried it out. Only ran for about 30 seconds. I plugged it back in and let it charge for the required 5 hours. It still would only run for about 30 seconds. I concluded either the battery or charger were defective. To me, this is not excusable and reflects on a company that does not test it's products before shipping.
customer_reviews.author: George Griffith

customer_reviews.title: Does a great job. Perfect for pets and house w/majority hardwood ...
customer_reviews.text: Use it for my whole house. Does a great job. Perfect for pets and house w/majority hardwood floors. Great for city living. I have a 3200 sq ft home (between the bedrooms, ground floor, basement, and attic) and I clean all of the house (floors, baseboards, ceiling corners, blinds) before the power runs out. I also thoroughly vacuum my dog's 2 beds and sofas of dog hair and there's still some juice left! (I don't use it in max mode; rarely seem to need it). Takes me roughly an hour to do all the above.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It does a great job and exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.text: It does a great job and exceeded my expectations, but Dyson should have designed it so that the battery is replaceable. That way, when the one on the vacuum is running low it could be swapped out for another battery that is fully charged, just like the cordless tool manufacturers have been doing for quite some time now. I think they should have designed it that way even if it meant sacrificing battery life by another minute or two.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Was not able to charge after 30 days
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this vacuum on Nov 19th, just over one month later the vacuum will not charge. While it worked it was great and we loved everything about it. We just returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Elisabeth Vezzani

customer_reviews.title: I love, love my new dyson
customer_reviews.text: I love, love my new dyson. It came when it was promised and there was no assembly. It is very lightweight and easy to use but very powerful. I would recommend this dyson to everyone who wants an exceptional cleaner
customer_reviews.author: Sheila R

customer_reviews.title: Dyson vacuum shocks my hand while in use.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good vacuum but go on line and Google: “Dyson vacuum shocks hand”. There are countless complaints, including mine, about being shocked through the charge port, and Dyson’s, verified by electrical engineers, BS responses to the complaints. Not a tiny shock and not fun.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Best vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: 2.5 years later and this thing is still going strong. This was a great purchase. I love this vacuum and I recommend it to everyone. It's easy to use, but it's also easy to clean the vacuum itself. Dumping dirt out, getting hair out, cleaning filters and rollers. This thing was made to be used! After 2.5 years, I can still meticulously vacuum at least 1500 Sq feet of my house, maybe 2000, on one charge. I love not dealing with cords, especially since I have a 3 and 1 year old. I can whip around vacuuming while they're around without worrying about them pulling out the plug. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: 7 Min/charge; No interchangeable battery
customer_reviews.text: Would give it 5 stars if there was an interchangeable battery found on any number of battery powered tools in Lowe's & Home Depot. Not only does the battery only last 7 min's on high, but if/when they Dyson does come out with said interchangeable battery model, we'd have to buy the entire device again. For that reason I'm, not fond of Dyson's intentional engineered obsolescence.
customer_reviews.author: two-smart-one

customer_reviews.title: YOUR CLEANING SOULMATE
customer_reviews.text: Are you a slightly neurotic, ok obsessive, cleaner? Then this is your cleaning soulmate. I am obsessed with this thing. Yes the first day your thumb gets a little raw from holding it down. I don't know why they can't fix this. But you figure out how to hold it down without it rubbing your finger. And after that, the magic happens. You see that canister fill with dirt (or in my case, dirt and dog hair) and you feel like all is right with the world. I always use the "Turbo" mode and it doesn't last that long (maybe 30 minutes?) which they should also fix, but the performance is so fantastic I just deal with it.
customer_reviews.author: DOGLUVER

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic, lightweight, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I have long hair that falls everywhere it seems. Have been using this Dyson 8 Absolute for at least 2 years and love it! This week it stopped working so I called Dyson & a lovely woman helped me by walking thru the steps to clean the filters on it. Seriously, I’m embarrassed because I didn’t even know those filters were there! A good cleaning w water, being super careful to let the filters AIR-DRY, no sunlight....and whoopee, it’s working again like gangbusters. The only way I’d give up this lightweight Dyson (approx. 5.5 lbs)....would be if they produced a lighter AND more powerful stick vacuum. My suction power is great, but who doesn’t want more power? Great machine!
customer_reviews.author: Lucy Love

customer_reviews.title: If I would hold my hand abnormally low or squat down it was fine. That led me to call Dyson and try ...
customer_reviews.text: At 6' tall this pushed way to hard. The angle of incline of the up-tube made too much resistance pushing. If I would hold my hand abnormally low or squat down it was fine. That led me to call Dyson and try to buy an extention which would have reduced the angle and made it acceptable. Unfortunately they do not make one, so I returned.
customer_reviews.author: 309 JW

customer_reviews.title: After a year of weekly use...
customer_reviews.text: Pros: cordless, lightweight. Cons: 1) Have to hold the ON button down to use. I nearly get blisters every time I use this. 2) The ON button is located right where you grab the body to empty it. Hence, it constantly turns on while I'm trying to empty it into a bag and sucks the bag up. 3) The carpet brush seems to mostly roll pet fur into clumps and leaves them on the surface of the carpet instead of sucking them up. 4) Zero notice that it's going to shut off due to drained battery. You really don't know when exactly you'll be suddenly left with a half-clean room. A 3-minute-notice beep would have been a helpful feature.
customer_reviews.author: nm

customer_reviews.title: I love this vacuume cleaner!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this vacuum cleaner! It is powerful and quite. It does a great job on wood/tile floors as well as carpets. If I were going to make a design change I would put the release button to change the heads at the top of the wand.
customer_reviews.author: RM

customer_reviews.title: Great for small homes, battery life and/or power sucks
customer_reviews.text: No pun intended, the battery life and/or power SUCKS. There are two settings, low or high. You can have about 7 minutes of vacuum life on high, about 13 minutes on low, but it doesn't work as well. I end up having to sweep the house into little piles and vacuuming them up so that I have enough battery life to vacuum the rug. Vacuuming carpet sucks more life out of the batteries. It takes hours to recharge as well. We have a 1,100 sq ft home, so it's really nice to pull it out here and there as opposed to a giant vacuum. However, the battery life is a drawback.
customer_reviews.author: Alexia Younger

customer_reviews.title: The vacuum works great however the batter life being fully charged and placed ...
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working a few weeks after purchase. Called dyson they sent a new charger that took 2 weeks to arrive. That didn’t work so now sending a new charger.... still waiting for that to arrive another 2 week wait. No guarantee that will fix the problem. Too expensive to stop working that quick. Have a house full of kids and no vacuum mommas not happy and the floors are disgusting!
customer_reviews.author: Athena

customer_reviews.title: A review for a vacuum? This vacuum sucks.  In a super manner.
customer_reviews.text: Well I have this vacuum for quite a while and what a difference does this one make. The first couple of times the canister was full with debris. I replaced this one with an highly rated vacuum by CR. Now months further dusting is less often needed. This vacuum sucks it all up so it does not show later on your furniture. And with maximum boost you will get every dust particle on your floor. Not cheap but am I happy I bought this one. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Robbert

customer_reviews.title: DON’T WASTE YOUR MONEY!!
customer_reviews.text: WARNING: DON’T WASTE YOUR MONEY!! I am having to send in my Absolute V8 for repairs for the second time in less than two years...this leaves me without a vacume cleaner for three weeks!! The first time I had to send it in for repairs it was only 4 months old!! Both times it has had an intake issue. It dies soon after I put it into max suction mood (carpet mood). It is still under warranty but I have zero confidence that it won’t break soon after my two year warranty is up, two months from now. I wish I had saved some money and bought a shark.
customer_reviews.author: L. McCormack

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but good
customer_reviews.text: What an expensive vacuum this is. But, it's kind of worth it. It's small yet powerful. It picks up dirt that I would have never noticed. Even after i clean, it still manages to pick up more dirt from god knows where. My biggest complaints are that it has kind of terrible battery life on top of the fact that you cant use it while it's charging. So, if you battery is drained then tough luck. Have fun spending an hour for this to charge. My second complaint is that the swappable heads break a little too easily.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando

customer_reviews.title: Contrary to Amazon's recommended bought together suggestion
customer_reviews.text: PLEASE NOTE, Contrary to Amazon's recommended bought together suggestion, after contacting Dyson, there are no attachments for sale for the V8 model other than what comes in the box. The older attachments will not attach to the newer V8 model and until Dyson comes out with an adapter (if they ever choose to), so all the folks buying the recommended add ons, like me, will also be requesting return packing slips.
customer_reviews.author: C. Olson

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum for someone who doesn't NEED to vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: I have wood and tile floors. I bought this because of my small area rugs and figured I didn't need a big, corded vacuum. If you pass over the same spot on the carpet 5-6 (6-10 if you have a gravel driveway) times, it will clean it. However, the suction "sucks." This is a great duster. If you don't have real dirt in your home, this is your vacuum. If you have kids this will not pick up a single cheerio off the floor so prepare to sweep and vacuum. Or just sweep that's what I do.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Martin

customer_reviews.title: Love this vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: I love this vacuum. I have a Labrador Retriever who sheds quite a bit. It is so easy to use, that I don’t mind using it every other day, especially since it’s cordless. So much easier then dragging out a big vacuum for quick mid week clean ups. It also has a great attachment for furniture, that works very well on dog hair. This is my first bagless vacuum and it is wonderful to see all the dirt and fur it has picked up and super easy to empty. Definitely happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie B

customer_reviews.title: Upgrading my rating. Great power, long cleaning time.  Dog hair be gone!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t originally impressed with my cordless. Then we got a puppy. Now, a year and a half later I find myself really dependent on it! It grabs dog hair dirt and dander off my floor like I can’t believe! I have a golden retriever and OMG, the hair is continuous! I can no longer be without this vac! My only beef with this vac is that I would love to see it come with tools that also work with the corded Dyson. Now I have 2 sets of tools that are not interchangeable. :( I would also like to see a flexible hose accessory.
customer_reviews.author: B. Moret

customer_reviews.title: Battery Dies after a year
customer_reviews.text: Started out like a 5 star vacuum we absolutely loved it, we had it just over a year then the battery runs down very quickly. We now get 1 min on high and 2-3 min on low power. I have contacted Dyson about a replacement. We will see how well they stand by their warranty. Will update when/if I get a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Love my Dyson
customer_reviews.text: Love that its not tied to an electrical cord so can easily move around the house. One charge can clean a 2 bedroom house easily. Used the power section on the rug and was so surprised at how much dust it picked up. Having a dog, I usually do spot vacuums where his hair collects into a fur ball. Having to lug the old vacuum used to be so cumbersome but with the Dyson, its easy to do the spot vacuums. Love how easy it is to change attachments, from short ones to long ones, like when theres a spider in the corner of the ceiling, just grab the Dyson, put on the long attachment, and bye bye spider!
customer_reviews.author: ScubaGal

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I use this almost every day and now my home is clean all the time even though I have a dog and a cat. I have a central vac and a heavy duty upright but they are both a pain to get out and use so I used to vacuum rarely. The Dyson is handy, light, and easy to use and takes care of the frequently used rooms in 20 minutes. And does it ever get the dirt out! I haven't run down the battery yet. There is a tool for everything. Expensive but worth every dime.
customer_reviews.author: NixB

customer_reviews.title: Product was opened before!
customer_reviews.text: Even though we ordered brand new, the product arrived in an open box. The bottom lid was torn apart. And it looked like some of the parts were removed from the box. However, most of the stuff and accessories were never used and within their original packaging so we assumed this is a returned item before any use and went with it without returning. Nevertheless, I’m disappointed that the seller didn’t check their items before shipping considering this is not a cheap product. Other than that, it looks like there is no problem with the product itself. Does the job. We will see how it will hold up in time.
customer_reviews.author: Emre

customer_reviews.title: Electric SHOCK
customer_reviews.text: Had this 6 months... this week started SHOCKING ME from the handle where it plugs into the charger. I just spent 1hr 20 min on the phone with Customer Service (Manager Donovan in Illinois) and was told there are TONS OF YOUTUBE videos about this happening and to rub it with a dryer sheet. I told them I have little kids and I'm worried. They are letting me send it in with no loaner and to wait over a week for an answer. I'll never buy another Dyson after this.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe I'm actually writing a review on a vacuum, however I run a B&B and this vacuum has actually improved my rating from a 4.8 star to 5 so I had to pay back Dyson directly for this. It allows me to clean all 3 floors in record time from hard wood to heavy carpet rugs with the same accessories. It also allows me to remove anything in cracks that seem to constantly be filled with random guest stuff. If you run the vacuum on the lower set point then it will last the entire time to clean a 5600 sqft home from top to bottom without a recharge.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Brand new out of the box. Claims up to 40 minutes of run time, I barely get 15, no exaggeration. (Even on the recommended low suction setting for longer battery life) Absolutely not worth the money. Would never buy nor recommend again. Poor poor performance. Very disappointed. I'll stick with my shark!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it, though low battery life
customer_reviews.text: As many reviewers mention, the battery life on this is quite charge, esp. if you use the high suction mode. However, this is NOT a vacuum you should use to vacuum your house. It's great for everyday maintenance. I use it every day in the high traffic areas of my home (kitchen, family room, hallway) to keep it clean. Love how light it is, and the suction is great. My only complaint, again is the battery life. The actual battery died and we weren't able to recharge it at all. I contacted Amazon and they replaced it, no questions asked.
customer_reviews.author: Kcs seattle

customer_reviews.title: Even better than V7
customer_reviews.text: I was not a fan of Dyson before I decided to get a V7 for trial. The build quality and performance of this vacuum is unbelievable. Now with seasonal discount (post Black Friday) I finally got the chance to pick up a V8 Absolute. I’m blown away by the extra power and all the additional accessories shipped with it. This is an absolute must and I am 200% recommending this product. Now the house will be even cleaner with V7 for the top floor and V8 for the rest of our house. 👍🏽
customer_reviews.author: Henry Mbayen

customer_reviews.title: Best vacuum I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love this thing. Originally I bought this thinking we would use it to get the quick small messes. But it turns out we ended up giving away our other vacuum cleaner because the Dyson cleans so much better. I hope we get many years out of the battery. My only complaint is that the manual instructs us to clean the filter every week. But even after several months, the filter seems like new. Hardly a complaint, I know. Also, you have to be careful not to drop it on the floor. The plastics can and will break. Fortunately I was about to put it back together with replacing anything yet.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend for hardwood floors
customer_reviews.text: I got the V8 Absolute with hardwood attachment. Amazing, my hardwood floor has never been this clean until this vacuum. Suction is fantastic and can reach almost anywhere except below really low furnitures like a couch. No more hair and tiny dust bunnies! The only concern I have is the battery life is not long, so I need to plan my cleaning and avoid running out of battery in the middle of cleaning then have to wait for 4 hours for it to charge.
customer_reviews.author: Lilyan

customer_reviews.title: Handy vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact it is so easy to grab and take care of a small mess. It beats dragging out the big floor vacuum for 1 minute of work. On high speed the battery does not last long but considering the size of the battery pack I see why. Cleaning up cob webs, stairs and vehicle (floor and cargo areas) are now fast and easy. I just wish they would have a removable battery pack like power tools do so you can change and keep going.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after 6 months of very little use ( we have a housecleaner so just use it a few times a week for touch ups), seller will not replace or refund. I was expecting a lot more for such an expensive vacuum !
customer_reviews.author: Christel Longo

customer_reviews.title: Not getting what you pay for!
customer_reviews.text: WORST product. Best feature is the fact that it’s cordless. Battery life is terrible. Smell is AWFUL due to pet hair (and my chocolate lab is not a smelly dog) and it literally runs for 1 minute max. I’ve taken it to the Dyson repair shop once (that’s 45 mins from my house) and they said 2 minute run time is typical. What in the world. Do not believe “40 minute” hype...never ran for more than 5 mins.
customer_reviews.author: erin

customer_reviews.title: it is working really great. enough to quickly clean a two bedroom apartment
customer_reviews.text: it is working really great. enough to quickly clean a two bedroom apartment even using the max suction which eats the battery really fast. amazing how much stuff can this get from carpet..... the first one i got was a lemon, i feel like electricity shocking me in the handle.. i put some electrical tape all around and that solve the problem, so i returned, got the replacement, and problem solved.... no more need for tape.
customer_reviews.author: Dino

customer_reviews.title: Bad charger or battery
customer_reviews.text: Battery or charger won't work :( Charged for two days after arrival. My first time using it I LOVED it (hence 3 stars). Amazing and perfect but it died after 5 minutes of use. I will update after we get resolution. Hopefully I can upgrade to 5 stars. **Update, they sent me a package new one. I absolutely love this thing! If I was rich I would buy all family and friends with toddlers one. It is a must for kids and dogs.....plus the cats, chickens, friends, etc., etc. Thank you for making this thing Dyson!!
customer_reviews.author: TKC

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after one day. will not turn back on. Returning to Amazon to be replaced.
customer_reviews.author: George S.

customer_reviews.title: Weak vacuum with too many problems.
customer_reviews.text: May be my worst purchase ever. Super expensive, but It’s so problematic. I’ve had trouble with it in the first few months. It loses its power too quick, like will die in less than 1 minute. Barely sucks compared to my old plug in vacuum. Customer service was always unable to help. They never really answer your questions or direct you towards a solution. Truly truly regret buying this thing and have lost all trust in Dyson products from here on out.
customer_reviews.author: E. Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Great for Dust Buster Clean ups! Strong Suction but only for 10-15 minutes
customer_reviews.text: We love it it is so convenient to just grab this cordless vacuum whenever there is a little bit of mess on the floor, and not have to drag out the big vacuum with the cord and plug it in. It has enough power to clean up little areas here and there with great suction but I would not use it to clean the whole upstairs floor because it would run out of charge. Think Dustbuster! That’s how you use this thing! The only thing that could be improved upon is another battery that could pop in and out when one ran out of charge!
customer_reviews.author: Debra K. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Battery does not last long
customer_reviews.text: I really liked it until the battery started to die recently, after less than two years after purchase. I think the review depends on how much you use it. If you vacuum hardwood floor just a few times a week, it might last for years but those who vacuum every day, having two dogs and carpet floor, the battery wears out very fast. Mine works only for 7 minutes now. I still have a few weeks before 2 year warranty expires but I can’t live without a vacuum cleaner so I’ll just order a new battery.
customer_reviews.author: piyoko

customer_reviews.title: Best vacuum cleaner we ever had
customer_reviews.text: We just love our Dyson. It is perfect for our house. We mostly have hardwood floors with area rugs. We don't vacuum the whole house all at once, but just a few rooms at a time, so the charge is plenty long for us. The vacuum cleaner is light and because it is cordless, it is easy to maneuver around the furniture. The attachments are great for cleaning cat hair off the furniture. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: LKN

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for all house needs with pets.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our pregnant daughter. Two story house, with a cat and a dog. Picked up all the fur and easy to carry up stairs. Worked on bare floors as well as carpets and stairs. Made her job a lot easier. Only complaint I have is that battery drains quickly in full power using carpet tool, but found full power wasn't necessary to do the job well. Love cordless.
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Love my Dyson
customer_reviews.text: Love my Dyson!!! I waited for a company to come out with a good cordless vac. It took a while before I could purchase one. I went for the newest version and have enjoyed owning it and using it. No more fighting over whose turn it is to vacuum! It's my turn—virtually all the time! No cord is wonderful. The dust cup gets full fairly fast, but empties easily. I had to get an extra filter due to the high dust in my area. Dyson customer service was quick to answer my questions and gave me helpful information on how to get the most out of the vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri Kimbrough

customer_reviews.title: Love except hate how greedy dyson is now
customer_reviews.text: Bought mine in 2018 and I LOVE it. So I went to purchase a second for a family member and just noticed that now...during the pandemic this is now raised almost $90 MORE than what I originally paid for the same thing a year and a half ago. That's horribly greedy, dyson.
customer_reviews.author: HCMG4

customer_reviews.title: My new best friend
customer_reviews.text: This machine is a miracle. It picks up SO much dirt and dust from my ivory carpets. One year in, and my carpet still looks great! I regularly use it on tile floors with no problem. It is easy to clean and simple to store. I’ve never run out of power and I am cleaning a four story townhome. It even remains charged when off the charging base for a period. The only downside is holding the power trigger. Your finger starts hurting after awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: I replaced a dead dyson with this one around 2 yrs ago. . It doesn’t do a really good job picking up the pet hair and I can’t do my entire appt without the battery going dead in the middle of the work. It claims to pick up larger bits of debris, but won’t pick up Cheerios. The inside of the vac is terribly dirty and there’s no way to get in and clean it out. I’m disappointed that I’ve spent good money on a product that is about to die after only 2 years
customer_reviews.author: Patty Smith

customer_reviews.title: Best Vacuum Ever!
customer_reviews.text: BEST vacuum ever! I love this. I used to think Dyson was gimmicky, but in reality, their product is very very good. I bought a Bessel Pet vacuum for ~ 250.-- and it is OK, but no way does it allow me to get into places as this Dyson V8. Also, it probably picks up more dust and hair. This is my second Dyson and I've decided that this is the way to go. Well worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen N.

customer_reviews.title: This is a great vacuum cleaner
customer_reviews.text: This is a great vacuum cleaner. It is so versatile. Clean floors , furniture and stairs. Would recommend it highly to anybody.
customer_reviews.author: Steve K.

customer_reviews.title: Battery Life
customer_reviews.text: For as much money as these things cost, the battery life is only good for 1.5 years, so its not worth it. Originally, my Dyson covered 1500 sq ft before needing a charge, but now only about 400 sq ft. Now, its pretty much no good to me. I need to switch to something that will clean all floors.
customer_reviews.author: WINDY DOBBS

customer_reviews.title: Good continuous suction
customer_reviews.text: Good continuous suction, light weight, easy to use and beautifully designed. The only reason why it didn't get 5 stars is the new Hard Surface attachment. There are two tiny wheels on this attachment and it traps all kinds of dust/hair in it, and it is a PITA to remove, see picture, lower right corner. Apart from that, the new attachment works perfectly on hardwood and tile floor.
customer_reviews.author: hwong668

customer_reviews.title: Cleans splendidly and is incredibly light, includes several tools
customer_reviews.text: The Dyson V8 Absolute cord free vacuum is wonderful and incredibly light! The battery lasts long enough, and it is handy to use. It has all of the gadgets that upright vacuums have. It has 2 cleaner heads (one for carpet and one for bare floors) and cleans well on both. The dust bin may be smaller, but it is easy to empty. I looked at other cordless vacuums, but most had only one head and few or no attachments. Cordless is much more convenient than an upright with a cord. The tools are easily attached and detached. This is my only vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: MaryD

customer_reviews.title: It's like a vacuum but made more vacuumy
customer_reviews.text: As I'm sure many people already joked about, this thing really sucks! It's quite powerful and versatile with all the attachments. Mounting it to a wall is easy. The battery lasts long enough for what I use it for. Maybe not long enough for a whole house but then get a non-stick vacuum. I use this for my 1br apartment and my car. Wow does this make keeping my car clean easy. I have black interior so every bit of dirt shows. With just 2 attachments, I can clean my floors and seats in 5 minutes
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: So I bought this from the amazon warehouse
customer_reviews.text: So I purchased this from the amazon warehouse at a steep discount. It came with a broken canister but when I contacted Dyson, they sent me a replacement under warranty so basically I got it for $269 and its in new enough condition that I think its a great deal and works perfectly. Wireless is the way to go if you have hardwood floors.
customer_reviews.author: Sundance07

customer_reviews.title: This product is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I love how well this product works cord-free. The suction's also great. Once you hang the device that holds the unit on the wall while charging (you can just plug it in for charging while outside of the cradle too) you'll be able to easily charge the device for both frequent or infrequent use. It's so easy to release the dirt, too. I have absolutely no problems with any aspect of this device.
customer_reviews.author: Scooter1968

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, but NOT 40 minutes.
customer_reviews.text: Great auction, easy to use attachments, soft spinning attachment is amazing for hardwood floors! It doesn't run for long using the spinning attachments though, and only a few minutes on Max. I feel like advertising 40 minutes of run time is VERY misleading.
customer_reviews.author: K. W.

customer_reviews.title: Dyson, the quick cat hair picker upper!
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 Long haired Maine Coon cats, a domestic short hair cat, a dog, a parrot and 2 finches. So as you can see I have lots to vacuum up. This Dyson is doing what none of the others I have had ever did. It goes under low things, swivels in odd corners and much more. It is worth the price. By being cordless it is so easy to use for quick pick ups.
customer_reviews.author: Skipper

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I already own a corded Dyson vacuum and I absolutely love it but I was looking for a cordless since I vacuum everyday and have 2 toddlers constantly dropping crumbs. I did a lot of research and finally decided on this one. OH MY GOSH! It is amazing! I've never been this happy about a vacuum before. This lightweight vacuum is very versatile and the suction is awesome. There wasn't anything on my floor today that it couldn't handle. I use pine litter for the cat's litter box and it had no issues picking it up. I know the price on these can look intimidating but it's been totally worth it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Stratiotes7

customer_reviews.title: I must say this is definitely a good buy. 1
customer_reviews.text: I debated quite a bit on getting this since it's so expensive. After using it for a month, I must say this is definitely a good buy. 1. Because it's cordless and so maneuverable, vacuuming the whole house is a cinch. 2. This thing really picks up dirt, even on low pile carpets. Using the carpet roller, I can pick up hairs that are semi-embedded into the carpet without even having to go "full power". 3. It's quiet. Very quiet compared to the upright vacuum cleaner. After getting used to it, holding down the trigger while vacuuming wasn't a problem at all.
customer_reviews.author: K Co.

customer_reviews.title: Not good for dog hair!
customer_reviews.text: We have 2 huskies and wanted a lightweight dyson that could easily pick up dog hair. We have the animal dyson, and it works great. This cordless V8 just pushed a majority of the dog hair around, even on max mode. The canister is very small, and the battery life is minimal with a full charge time of 5 hours. I would not recommend this product to anyone who actually wants to get a good clean, especially those with pets.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: I AM OBSESSED
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for a few weeks now and have used this vacuum almost every day since then! My floors have never been so clean. I mounted this in my laundry room next the the washer and it is so easy to pop off the wall and spot-vacuum after cooking, etc. I live in a dirt road and my husband is a farmer. That plus my farm dog tracks in gravel and dirt. The hard-floor attachment assures that the debris will be sucked up, rather than kicked around like typical brush-roller vacuums. I’m also loving being FREE FROM THE CORD. I would definitely purchase this again!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin McClaren

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this Vac!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We have a 3.5-year-old German/Dutch Shepard whose job must be not only eating intruders at night when they come around but to also shed his hair. How he is not bald is beyond me. Enter this AMAZING DYSON Vac!!! it makes short work of this hair ordeal and has power left to vacuum every room, rugs, and hardwoods are all sparkly when we are done vacuuming. Lightweight, trigger works great, I use it at 6'2" and have no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Welder RN

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum except for its "shutdown notification system"
customer_reviews.text: Vacuum is great when it runs. I would think a higher-priced item like this would have a better error notification system than "rev-rev-rev-off" It needs to tell us better what is shutting down the vacuum. Filters blocked? Which ones? Dying battery? Blockage? Where? Too hot? All the wonderful engineering does no good if you cant tell the user why it just revved and shut down.
customer_reviews.author: jivefive99

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 1 yr
customer_reviews.text: Purchased Dec 2, 2017, stopped working a little over a year later. For $500 I expect it to last longer. I have a $40 corded tiny dirt devil that’s lasted me 3.5 years already. So dumb. What a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Brooklyn Mom

customer_reviews.title: Absolutey love my Dyson!
customer_reviews.text: A friend told me about how much she loved her Dyson a few years ago. I watched and waited for a good deal and finally bought one. I absolutely love this vacuum. It works awesome and is very light weight. I am able to vacuum 9 rooms, 2 hallways and flight of stairs without loosing any suction power. I have told several of my friends and 2 have bought them and absolutely love it also!
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: POOR CUSTOMER SERVICE AND BATTERY CHARGE TOO SHORT TO CLEAN TINY APT
customer_reviews.text: I will start by saying the this is the BEST designed vacuum and there is no better mechanism to empty the vacuumed content. HOWEVER, the design does compensate for a battery that lasts less than 10 minutes of on/off use on hardwood and tile floors. I contacted Dyson via Facebook private message and asked whether additional battery packs were available. The answer, NO, with no alternate suggestions to improve run time. CANNOT RECOMMEND THE DYSON V8 ABSOLUTE CORDLESS STICK VACUUM.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Worth every Penny. But it all depends on what you will be using it for. If my house was carpeted, I would not be using this or Any other cordless. Carpets eat up dust more than you can imagine. Get the strongest suction as possible. I have a cleaning and Carpet cleaning company, Trust me on that!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: I waited a couple months to write this to see how I liked it. Good: it works and holds charge (on regular suction only) well. Love how it swivels under chairs, etc. Bad: super uncomfortable hand grip. Have to keep changing hands. And it’s unwieldy to change attachments and empty cartridge. And it’s positioned so that it activates every time I pick the darn thing up. Bottom line: I would have gone for a cheaper brand.
customer_reviews.author: V. Murray

customer_reviews.title: I like to think of this not as a vacuum cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I like to think of this not as a vacuum cleaner, but a powered up dust buster (due to the detachable orange tube.) It has the suction to pull up most debris as the average household vacuum, but to maintain that power level, you'll only get 20 minutes of battery life. This is good for cleaning sessions in small bursts, but not recommended for an extensive household cleansing.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: best vacuum for a small apartment
customer_reviews.text: love love love this vacuum. makes it easy and fun to clean the apartment. battery life is on the edge of being able to clean my whole apartment in one go, but I usually spot clean sections of the apartment over the course of the week, so it works great for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: PK

customer_reviews.title: Good, but has some drawbacks
customer_reviews.text: Extremely well made with incredible fit and finish. However, all of the weight is at the top: the rotary end will swing too easily as a result, and the weight of the motor end is hard on my wrist and shoulder. Does not replace my upright, and is best for bare floors. The long run time and ease of changing tools is fantastic. Way over-priced considering I still have to rely on my upright.
customer_reviews.author: Griffindor

customer_reviews.title: Best little vacuum
customer_reviews.text: This is a great vacuum! We have laminate floors throughout our home so this is easy to get around furniture and under furniture. If you use the battery saving mode it will last much longer. However, it only lasts about 20 minutes so you have to move fast to get the whole house done. Comes with attachments to do couches, baseboards, corners, etc. Only con is the wall hanger doesn’t have enough slots for all the attachments.
customer_reviews.author: BigDandcrafty

customer_reviews.title: No regrets
customer_reviews.text: I was really hesitant to spend this much money on a handheld vacuum, considering we already have a full-sized Dyson, but I needed something smaller/easier to use on a daily basis for stuff like crumbs and pet hair- sweeping never seems to get everything up. After having this vacuum for a couple months I have zero regrets on my purchase. I use it almost daily in my kitchen and entryway (laminate), sitting room (hardwood), and I’ll also use it in a pinch for our bedroom floors and sun porch which have low-pile carpeting. I have yet to run into any issues with battery performance or loss of suction.
customer_reviews.author: TimHortonLvr

customer_reviews.title: Leaves nothing behind
customer_reviews.text: This has made me a better housekeeper, sooooo handy and picks up all the fine dirt my other vac left behind. My floors are all travertine tile, no carpet. Ran the battery all the way down on my 1st run, with spring cleaning, in the high suction mode. Can't say how many minutes that was, 'cuz stopped several times to move furniture. Since then, I only clean 1 room at a time, no problem with running out of battery.
customer_reviews.author: Dena

customer_reviews.title: I love this vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I love this vacuum! It's powerful, light-weight, and comes with a nice assortment of attachments. Easy to empty when full. The charging station is really great, and I've attached it to the wall in my guest room closet. It's a bit on the smaller side, which is great for my 700 square foot apartment, but if you live in a big house, you'd probably spend a very long time cleaning all of the floors with this.
customer_reviews.author: clammyfresh

customer_reviews.title: Waste of my money !
customer_reviews.text: What an absolute piece of expensive junk ! Have had for 18 months now and have mostly stopped using it. The battery life stinks, suction power is useless ( need to use the roller attachments to pick most stuff up ). Will end up junking it or selling it at a garage sale this Spring for maybe $20. No more Dyson junk for us ! The good news.... I recently bought a Roomba on Amazon and it's wonderful. Will pick up most stuff, runs for almost 90 minutes on a charge and can be programmed to clean.
customer_reviews.author: YOWZA

customer_reviews.title: Great power and suction
customer_reviews.text: This is the most awesome vacuum I have ever used. I was worried that the suction power wouldn't be as good as a corded vacuum but it is so much better than my previous vacuum. It is easy to change the tools and works great in my car for dog hair. It is light and easy to handle and being cordless is great. I highly recommend this vacuum to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Sabredog

customer_reviews.title: Very Convenient
customer_reviews.text: Although this vacuum cleaner is pricey, it does a good job. My wife and I are both in our 80s so ease of use is a big factor. The only negative for this product is the weight of the handle that contains the motor. If you have weak hands or suffer from arthritis you might find it difficult to hold. It might be best to find this product of display at a store before you buy.
customer_reviews.author: My Opinion

customer_reviews.title: Great when battery is good, and piece of junk after battery died
customer_reviews.text: Battery died completely right at the two-year warranty mark. Will contact Dyson CS, and see if you can honor the replace for free. Will upgrade the rating after this.
customer_reviews.author: Li Zeng

customer_reviews.title: Quit working after 10 months
customer_reviews.text: When it worked, it worked really well. And then it just stopped. At first it would stop suction for a few seconds and then work normally. Like hiccups. My guess is a faulty wire that kept getting worse until it broke, but I have no idea why. I used it for normal household cleaning - nothing heroic or abusive to the system. I took it to a repair shop and they thought it still should be under warranty, but is not. Too bad. But it's super expensive to only have worked for less than a year.
customer_reviews.author: Anita B

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 2.5 years.
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is not worth the high price. I had it for 2.5 years and the battery totally died even though I cleaned the filters regularly. Called the company and of course the warranty just expired so i need to pay out of pocket for the repairs. I will not be fixing it because I don't think it's worth it. I was not impressed with the vacuum before it broke. It was loud, did not stand up, did a mediocre job at vacuuming and the battery life was always too short.
customer_reviews.author: Dorota Ward

customer_reviews.title: Battery died
customer_reviews.text: 13 months after getting one the battery faulted out flashing red. Contacted Dyson and they shipped me a new battery. Dyson was great with fixing it. Just worried about next year once it's out of warranty. Otherwise its great.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Haack

customer_reviews.title: A 5 star product.
customer_reviews.text: Super awesome product. it's not about comparing the specs. It's about how lazy you get connecting all the cords to use a vacuum. This one is so quick that you end up using it more often. Battery life fantastic. Using this in India now and works great even in the dusty conditions of India. Good finish. Would have wished for a flat front attachment for curtains etc. CAn't use the rotary attacthments for that as it might peel off the delicate threads of embroidery.
customer_reviews.author: Ankur Gupta

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely loved it. Stopped working after 4 months. Poor customer service.
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is everything I have been wanting, I absolutely loved it. However, it stopped working after 4 months and will no longer hold a charge. Now I am finding out that Dyson - despite their marketing spin - is just as unsatisfactory regarding quality/customer service as the majority of companies. It is a little hard to fathom consider the product costs $500, but that is life in the modern world unfortunately. Proceed with caution.
customer_reviews.author: E. Dupas

customer_reviews.title: It is nice for a quick vacuum of the kitchen or something
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this vacuum for almost 2 years. It is nice for a quick vacuum of the kitchen or something, but for every 1 minute of vacuuming, I spent 5 minutes trying to unclog it. And, I don't mean that I have sucked up a sock or something, it gets clogged if you try to pick up something bigger than a piece of dust. It involves taking the thing apart and searching for the phantom clog, which is almost never there. Finally, I get sick of it and grab our $75 vacuum and finish the job. I fell for the hype. You have been warned.
customer_reviews.author: BriGuy

customer_reviews.title: NOT AN AUTHORIZED DEALER. DYSON may NOT HONOR WARRANTY
customer_reviews.text: Update to the below review. 1 star to 2. After contacting Amazon, Dyson agreed to replace the battery as a warranty item, regardless of who I bought it from, so the issue was then resolved within 24 hrs of the initial warranty denial. NOT AN AUTHORIZED DYSON DEALER! The battery failed after about 2 two (2) months. No worries, right? It has a several year warranty- wrong. After forwarding this Amazon receipt to Dyson, their reply was that this purchase is from a not authorized dealer, and therefore they cannot honor their warranty, but I can still buy a replacement battery.
customer_reviews.author: frank j.

customer_reviews.title: favorite so far.
customer_reviews.text: This replaced our original yellow Dyson. We now have hardwood floors and use the fluffy brush on low suction and the carpet brush on high. Vacuumed someone else's house who had a cat of which I am super allergic, and it worked awesome! Only wish the battery lasted longer on high. The smaller power head is great for furniture too.
customer_reviews.author: Jadd

customer_reviews.title: HUGE WASTE OF MONEY
customer_reviews.text: The dyson v8 is a very expensive piece of junk. Don't waste your money--there are many better options out there for a fraction of the price. Customer service is dreadful. Good luck speaking or chatting with a real person to help resolve your issues. Cheap plastic parts that crack or chip easily and feel flimsy during normal use Have already had to replace the canister, main body, battery, and power cord/charger (basically the entire vacuum minus the various attachments)
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Pfeiler

customer_reviews.title: I will never go back to a corded vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I love this vacuum. It picks up everything. We hang it in the garage so it is charged and ready all the time. I have had it 8 months and love it more each time I use it. No problems with suction, clogging, anything. It cleans my carpet and the spider webs on the walls and the couch easily. Not having to hassle with a cord is magnificent. Thank you Dyson.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: I was surprised by how much it picked up on the first use.
customer_reviews.text: Even though my house is cleaned twice a month by an outside cleaning service, I was starting to get embarrassed because of the debris on the carpet and hardwood floors when guests came over. With the warmer weather my dog is starting to be outside more. With her long hair she brings in a lot of debris, especially when she sits in the mulch beds. I hate to drag out the canister vacuum to clean up after her. I used this today for the first time and the canister was about a third full. It is lightweight and easy to maneuver. The heads are a breeze to change. I am very happy I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Charley's Dad

product_meta.title: Dyson (214730-01) V8 Absolute Cordless Stick Vacuum Cleaner, Yellow
product_meta.description: 150 percent more brush bar power than the Dyson V6 cord-free vacuum. Two cleaner heads. Extra tools and whole machine filtration. Cord-free. Hassle-free. The most powerful suction. Up to 40 minutes of powerful suction. Trigger releases instantly. Battery power is only used for cleaning. Whole machine HEPA filtration captures allergens and expels cleaner air than the air you breathe. Powered by the Dyson digital motor V8, it creates the most powerful cordless vacuum. The direct-drive cleaner head drives bristles deeper into the carpet to remove even more dirt. It has 150Percent more brush bar power than the Dyson V6 cord-free vacuum. Invented for hard floors. The soft Roller cleaner head removes large debris and fine dust simultaneously. Hygienic dirt ejector empties dust from the bin in a single action. Mini motorized tool for tough tasks. Stiff nylon bristles remove pet hair and ground-in dirt from furniture, car seats and tight spaces. 2 tier Radial cyclones - 15 cyclones, arranged across two tiers, work in parallel to increase airflow and capture more fine dust. Max power mode provides 7 minutes of higher suction for more difficult tasks. Mini soft dusting brush for gentle dusting around the home. Balanced for cleaning up top, down below and in between. All Dyson cordless vacuums quickly convert to a handheld for quick clean UPS, spot cleaning and cleaning difficult places. 1tested to ASTM F558 against cordless models. Dyson received the highest numerical score among stick vacuums in the J. D. Power 2017 vacuum satisfaction study, based on 6, 965 total responses from 7 companies measuring the opinions of consumers who purchased a stick vacuum in the previous 12 months surveyed in February-march 2017. Your experiences may vary. CHARGING AND STORING: This machine will switch “OFF” if the battery temperature is below 37. 4°F(3°C). This is designed to protect the motor and battery. Do not charge the machine and then move it to an area with a temperature below 37. 4°F (3°C) for storage purposes. To help prolong battery life, avoid recharging immediately after a full discharge. Allow to cool for a few minutes. Avoid using the machine with the battery flush to a surface. This will help it run cooler and prolong battery run time and life Voltage is 21. 6.
feature_bullets: Cord free. Hassle free. Powerful suction, refer user manual for instructions
Up to 40 minute's run time when using a non-motorized tool. Suction power (Max mode): 115 AW
Lightweight and versatile, for easy home cleaning. Instant release trigger means battery power is only used while it’s cleaning. Requires charging for 4 hours minimum before first use
Up to 30 minutes of fade free power with the soft roller cleaner head
Direct drive cleaner head. Up to 8 minutes of fade free power (in Max mode). Drives stiff nylon bristles into carpets to capture deep down dirt
Whole machine HEPA filtration captures allergens and expels cleaner air than the air you breathe. Filtration: Washable lifetime filter
Powered by the Dyson digital motor V8 and engineered to pick up ground in dirt and fine dust from hard floors and carpets

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars3,607 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
specifications.Specific Uses For Product: Multi-surface, Hard Floors, Cordless, Carpet, Bagless
specifications.Included Components: V8 Absolute Vacuum^Docking Station^Combination Tool^Crevice Tool^Mini Soft Dusting Brush^Mini Motorized Tool
